description: Returns a URL to authorize requests based on the provided Authorization Method (https://developers.docusign.com/platform/auth/)
label: DocuSign - Get Authentication URL

options.name: method
options.label: Authentication method
options.info: The authentication strategy to use (See more: https://developers.docusign.com/platform/auth/)

options.name: clientID
options.label: Integration Key
options.info: Your Integration Key can be found in your Developer Dashboard at Docusign: https://apps-d.docusign.com/admin/apps-and-keys

options.name: redirectURI
options.label: Redirect URI
options.info: The redirect URL which you have specified for your application in DocuSign: https://apps-d.docusign.com/admin/apps-and-keys

options.name: state
options.label: State
options.info: An optional state value that you can use to prevent CSRF and replay attacks (See more: https://auth0.com/docs/secure/attack-protection/state-parameters)

options.name: loginHint
options.label: Login Hint
options.info: An optional login_hint that enables you to prepopulate the email address field on the sign-in screen.

options.name: result
options.label: Result
options.info: The authentication URL to redirect the user to
